text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the Lenovo 81FK0000US 15.6" FHD GTX 1050 4 GB VRAM i5-8300H 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the Lenovo 81FK0000US 15.6" FHD GTX 1050 4 GB VRAM i5-8300H 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Apex Legends. The build quality of the Lenovo 81FK0000US 15.6" FHD GTX 1050 4 GB VRAM i5-8300H 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Fortnite. The build quality of the Lenovo 81FK0000US 15.6" FHD GTX 1050 4 GB VRAM i5-8300H 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
